abstract: New technology has brought new challenges for parents trying to childproof their home for babies, toddlers and small children.
snippet: New technology has brought new challenges for parents trying to childproof their home for babies, toddlers and small children.
lead_paragraph: If you thought childproofing was about cabinet locks and baby monitors, think again. New technology has brought new challenges for parents trying to childproof their home for babies, toddlers and small children. The latest Home & Garden report offers practical, informative advice.

headline.main: New Rules for Childproofing a Home
